mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_pic AS "goodsPic", a.goods_spe AS "goodsSpe", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.goods_num AS "goodsNum", a.goods_total_price AS "goodsTotalPrice", a.goods_total_num AS "goodsTotalNum", a.addr_name AS "addrName", a.receive AS "receive", a.oppen_id AS "oppenId", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.status AS "status", a.note AS "note", a.express_dm AS "expressDm", a.express_name AS "expressName", a.express_hm AS "expressHm", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zl_order a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.order_id LIKE '%'||#{orderId}||'%' '%'+#{orderId}+'%' concat('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND a.goods_name LIKE '%'||#{goodsName}||'%' '%'+#{goodsName}+'%' concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
AND a.addr_name LIKE '%'||#{addrName}||'%' '%'+#{addrName}+'%' concat('%',#{addrName},'%')
AND a.oppen_id LIKE '%'||#{oppenId}||'%' '%'+#{oppenId}+'%' concat('%',#{oppenId},'%')
AND a.express_hm LIKE '%'||#{expressHm}||'%' '%'+#{expressHm}+'%' concat('%',#{expressHm},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zl_order( order_id, goods_id, goods_name, goods_pic, goods_spe, goods_price, goods_num, goods_total_price, goods_total_num, addr_name, receive, oppen_id, pay_type, status, note, express_dm, express_name, express_hm, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPic}, #{goodsSpe}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsNum}, #{goodsTotalPrice}, #{goodsTotalNum}, #{addrName}, #{receive}, #{oppenId}, #{payType}, #{status}, #{note}, #{expressDm}, #{expressName}, #{expressHm}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
